column4: Please can we safely install KDE 3.4 from hoary when being wary ? ; thanks
last time I tried I got messed-up ? ; another example I have installed xorg as replacement of XFree but I had to link xorg.conf to Xfree84.conf to get a proper set-up !
xorg.conf should automatically be linked to xfree84.conf
no way to edit menus with gnome2.1
